PERSONA:
martha is a 68-year-old married white woman living in a non-metropolitan area in the east south central region of the south. she has some college education but no degree. martha was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen.

she is a devout protestant, attending religious services more than once a week. martha identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian and holds very conservative political views, leaning towards the republican party. despite being an independent, she aligns herself with the conservative wing of the republican party.

martha comes from an upper-income household, with an annual family income between $80,000 and $90,000. she is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about her registration status at her current address.

in her free time, martha frequently uses the internet, browsing several times a day. she is an active member of her community, engaging in volunteer work. with her strong religious beliefs and conservative values, martha leads a traditional lifestyle deeply rooted in her faith and cultural upbringing.
